file_content.text: I saw it. I saw everything. Every life. Every life he took--I took. It's all I can see anymore.
I'm a monster....
That's not true--you'll be okay. I'll take you to Tython. The Jedi will help you restore your mind, make you whole again.
And then she'll be no good to us. We need to understand the connection Vitiate established with this Jedi so we can stop it or exploit it.
Yeah, and let me guess--the process is "invasive." Hasn't she been through enough?
We've bought ourselves some time--that's all. We can't risk the fate of the galaxy just to assuage your guilt.
You want to take her brain apart and you don't even know if you'll find anything!
We have to try!
He's never leaving! I'm going to hear him forever!
The Jedi goes with Theron.
Have her rehabilitated.
Do what you have to, Lana.
Experiment on her.
Her suffering ends. [Kill her]
Master Surro goes with Theron.
Have her rehabilitated.
Lana--you take her.
Experiment on her.
Her suffering ends. [Kill her]
She's at peace now.
I could have saved her.
You may have killed us all.
You're joking. Tell me you're joking.
What? You've got to be kidding me!
This is your mess now. I'm.... I'm gone.
I hope you're happy.
I don't even know what to say to you.
You heard her.
You heard him.
Come on. I'll get you shipped out of here soon as I can.
Well, let's hope she doesn't turn the Imperial Army on us. Just to be safe, I'll get Master Surro offworld soon as I can.
She must be talking to you.
I'll see that she's taken somewhere secure.
I suppose we can be grateful that we managed some manner of progress.
You know, Vitiate gave up on trying to take control of me some time ago. Perhaps he's not as powerful as we were led to believe.
Still, he is more than formidable. We've only stopped him temporarily, and war still rages. We have much to do.
We got a break from the Emperor, but that may only last until all the trained killing machines we zapped get on their feet again.
I know we got some kind of reprieve from the Emperor, and I know that you....
You know what? I can't. I can't talk to you right now.
Meantime, maybe we can get Saresh to agree to a strategic retreat.
